channel.title: village
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "village" - my village has blow up and i,m season 2.how can i join the champion village?

item.title: Re: village
item.content:encoded: Same way you would any other village, wait for the Kaiju to make a new village, then apply. Since you're season 2 it will show up in the villages list, look for the one lead by your Kage turned Kaiju and apply.

item.title: village
item.content:encoded: my village has blow up and i,m season 2.how can i join the champion village?
